The claim originated from a fake news ar: an entertainment website known for publishing fictional stories.
The article titled: Keith Richards Found Not Dead in San Francisco Hotel" was written in a manner that resembled a genuine news report, leading some people to believe the claim.
The article included a fictional quote f: D'lune, who falsely claimed that Keith Richards was found alive in his hotel suite.
The expert: s verdict confirms that Keith Richards is alive and that the claim of his death in January 2016 is entirely false.
